channel.title: Windows 8
channel.description: I'm looking into getting windows 8 as my OS, and i'm looking to get cheaper then the asking price (100$ ish). Does anyone have any suggestions?

item.title: Windows 8
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Quick reminder to everyone that we don’t allow pirated content to be posted here.

@ Op - There is a subreddit for exchanging software (http://www.reddit.com/r/softwareswap/) you might be able to trade something you have for Windows 8.

Read full topic
